title: Parental favoritism
headline: Parental favoritism
content:
Favoritism is a common phenomenon in many hoseholds. It may not represent a difference in the love parents feel, bt it can look and feel that way to a child. A stdy titled \201cMothers\2019 Differentiation and Depressive Symptoms Among Adlt Children\201d fond that siblings who sensed that their mother consistently favored or rejected one child over another were more likely to exhibit depression in middle age. Tre, it may not be possible to treat every child eqally becase they are all different. Bt what parents can, and mst, do is treat their children with compassion and fairness, by meeting all of their reqirements.

Rabeya Hashmi, by email
intro: Favoritism is a common phenomenon in many hoseholds. It may not represent a difference in the love parents feel, bt it can look and feel that way to a child.
